events.description: Edouard Julien singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Willie Calhoun.
Twins challenged (force play), call on the field was overturned: Carlos Correa singles on a ground ball to shortstop Anthony Volpe. Edouard Julien to 2nd.
Byron Buxton walks. Edouard Julien to 3rd. Carlos Correa to 2nd.
Trevor Larnach out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Aaron Judge. Edouard Julien scores. Carlos Correa to 3rd. 1 out
Jose Miranda doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Aaron Judge. Carlos Correa scores. Byron Buxton scores.
Donovan Solano doubles (2) to right field, on fan interference. Jose Miranda scores.
Nick Gordon grounds out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Donovan Solano to 3rd. 2 outs
Christian Vazquez doubles (2) on a fly ball to center fielder Aaron Judge. Donovan Solano scores.
Michael A. Taylor homers (2) on a fly ball to center field. Christian Vazquez scores.
Pitching Change: Colten Brewer replaces Jhony Brito.
Edouard Julien homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Carlos Correa homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Byron Buxton walks.
Wild pitch by pitcher Colten Brewer. Byron Buxton to 2nd.
